tokens.text: moves around randomly like a vex

note: No longer used for the `vex` entity. Instead, `minecraft:navigation.walk` and `minecraft:behavior.float` allow the `vex` entity to navigate.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Vex Random Move Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to move around randomly like the Vex.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
